original: Ödin, Thor Erik, rådman, auditör, Visby, f. 28/3/08 i Visby av fabr. Jo- han Fredrik Ö. o. Elisabeth Andersson. G. m. Margaretha Hedén. Barn: Thorbjörn f. 43. — Stud:ex. i Visby 26, jur. kand. i Upps. 33. Tingstjg. i Gotl. norra doms. 33-3S, tf. rådm. i Visby 36, ord. sed. 37, auditör v. Gotl. kustart :kår sed. 42. Ordf. i hyresnd i Visby sed. 44. Hobbies: skytte, bridge.
translated: Ödin, Thor Erik, magistrate, auditor, Visby, b. 28/3/08 in Visby, son of Jo- han Fredrik Ö., a factory worker, and Elisabeth Andersson. Married to Margaretha Hedén. Children: Thorbjörn b. 43. — Completed studies in Visby in 26, law degree in Uppsala in 33. Served as a court clerk in the northern district of Gotland from 33-3S, acting magistrate in Visby in 36, regular magistrate from 37, auditor for the Gotland coastal guard since 42. Chairman of the rental committee in Visby since 44. Hobbies: shooting, bridge.
